name: LYNK GLOBAL INC (FKA UBIQUITILINK)
description: Ubiquitilink augments terrestrial wireless coverage via small satellites.
sampleDescriptions: Issues related to the provision of wireless telecommunications service in areas not served by terrestrial networks.
Issues related to the space-based deployment of LTE base stations.
